title: 1914년 Vasquez 사건

description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Leonardo L. Vasquez v. the State
**판결일**: 1914-06-24
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Davidson, Harper

## 변호인

R.W. Hudson  and  Magus Smith  and  Jno. R. Storms  and  Edwin F.  Vanderbiel  and  W.F. Ramsey  and  C.L. Black,  for appellant. — On question of the court's charge: Goodwin v. State,  58 Tex. Crim. 496 ; Cecil v. State, 44 id., 450; Jones v. State, 57 id., 144; Armstead v. State, 48 id., 304; Dawson v. State, 38 id., 50.

 C.E. Lane,  Assistant Attorney General, for the State.

## 인용

- 171 S.W. 1160
- 74 Tex. Crim. 491

## 판결문 요약

I agree to the conclusion but not all the reasoning. *Page 495 ...
